[[Guy]] punches the opponent aside, only to apologise and embrace them, fracturing the opponent's back and doing liberal damage. 
 
== Trivia == 
* This technique is a comical reference to Guy's first appearance in the original manga/anime, right down to hitting his opposition while also hugging them (only the opponent unlike [[Rock Lee|Lee]] in the original segment, does not hug back).
* In the ''Clash of Ninja'' series, Kakashi can perform this technique by copying it with his [[Sharingan]].
* If used on Lee, he would scream out Guy's name in pain.

[[es:Joven Abrazo Espiritual de la Juventud]]
[[pl:Seishun no Atsuki Hōyō]]
